Package io.anserini.ltr

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AvgIDFFeatureExtractorTest  
    BaseFeatureExtractor<K>
    Feature extractor class that forms the base for other feature extractors
    BaseFeatureExtractorTest<T>
    This class will contain setup and teardown code for testing feature extractors
    BigramFeaturesTest
    Create some temporary documents and test the correctness of ordered and unordered window phrase extractors
    BM25FeatureExtractorTest
    Tests that BM25 score is computed according to our formula
    DocSizeFeatureExtractorTest
    Test we get the doc size correctly
    DumpTweetsLtrData  
    FeatureExtractionArgsTest
    Tests that Arguments for the FeatureExtractorCli can be parsed.
    FeatureExtractorChainFromJsonTest
    Will test that constructing a feature extractor chain works correctly
    FeatureExtractorCli
    Main class for feature extractors feed in command line arguments to dump features
    ICTFFeatureExtractorTest
    Test ICTF feature extractor is implemented according to the Carmel, Yom-Tov synthesis series book
    LoadFeatureExtractorFromFileTest
    Test loading feature extractors from files
    PMIFeatureExtractorTest
    Test implementation of PMI
    SCQFeatureExtractorTest  
    SCSFeatureExtractorTest
    Tests the simplified clarity feature
    TermFrequencyFeatureExtractorTest
    Test the term frequency feature extractor is correct
    TFIDFFeatureExtractorTest
    Make sure that TFIDF feature extractor gives the scores as caculated by the formula in the feature extractor, does not have all components of the lucene formula
    TweetsLtrDataGenerator  
    TwitterFeatureExtractor
    Feature extractor for the twitter collections.
    TwitterFeatureReranker
    Used to rerank according to features
    UnigramFeaturesTest
    Tests the unigram count feature
    WebCollectionLtrDataGenerator
    A reranker that will be used to dump feature vectors for documents retrieved from a search
    WebFeatureExtractor
    Feature extractor for the gov two collection
